help.name: Stop
help.description: Start action is used to stop the local AREasy server instance or a remote instance, or to interrupt the execution process of an active action that runs on a specific channel. In case of you want to stop a remote instance or an action from a remote instance you have to provide admin credentials (user credentials used to connect to the AR System instance).
help.syntax: areasy -action stop [-host AREasyHost -aruser ARSystemUser -arpassword ARSystemPassword] [-channel ExecutionChannel]

option.description: The host name or IP address where the AREasy server is running
Remedy account name referred by AREasy instance
Password for Remedy account referred by AREasy instance. The password value could be plain text of obfuscated (encrypted)
Execution channel number (i.e. 2) or channel name (i.e. areasy-2)

sample.description: Stops local server instance or AREasy server instance that is specified in the configuration file
Stops AREasy server instance specified in the command line
Interrupts execution of action that runs on channel 3
